Save your valuable time on trainings and let your organization grow quickly Published on : Monday, October 12, 2015
This is something that we are sharing from our real life experience. Every new month 2-3 people joins in and becomes the part of a CorpTeaser family, Being a startup and SME company we couldn’t afford to hire a fulltime trainer like most other SME companies and we also realized that the training given are repetitive and not really productive where the department heads and key people’s hours of time was invested.
So, we decided to make the videos of all departmental training programs, It’s been 6 months from now and 16 new people has joined the company but 90% of their training has been done by the videos. Without investing the organizations key personnel’s time. Rest 10% we achieve through the personal interaction and counseling.
You can ask to any of the CorpTeaser’s employee about their experience of how the training program was and they will answer, it was easy, effective and fun! And we believe it has saved hours of productive time of our team which helped the company to reach new heights quickly.
Making training videos is really a smart decision because a onetime video production is not going to cost you what a repetitive personal training will.If you feel that you also need to have an employee training videos for your company and need assistance, we will be happy to work with you!
